languages.text: "За твоими словами скрывается истина, мон-кай, которую мне не дано узреть прямо сейчас. Но я обязательно увижу ее судьбу во снах. А до тех пор я буду молиться богам о том, чтобы они были к ней благосклонны".

traits.locale_text: "За твоими словами скрывается истина, мон-кай, которую мне не дано узреть прямо сейчас. Но я обязательно увижу ее судьбу во снах. А до тех пор я буду молиться богам о том, чтобы они были к ней благосклонны".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."
languages.original_text: "За твоими словами скрывается истина, мон-кай, которую мне не дано узреть прямо сейчас. Но я обязательно увижу ее судьбу во снах. А до тех пор я буду молиться богам о том, чтобы они были к ней благосклонны".

traits.locale_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Hay verdad en tus palabras, mon-keigh; una verdad que ahora mismo no soy capaz de ver. Pero no me cabe duda de que su destino me será revelado en mis sueños. Hasta entonces, rogaré a los dioses que sean benévolos con ella».
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."

traits.locale_text: «Hay verdad en tus palabras, mon-keigh; una verdad que ahora mismo no soy capaz de ver. Pero no me cabe duda de que su destino me será revelado en mis sueños. Hasta entonces, rogaré a los dioses que sean benévolos con ella».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前の言葉の裏には真実がある…今の私には見えぬ真実がな。だが、彼女の運命は私の夢の中で必ず明かされるだろう。それまでは…神々に、彼女への慈悲を乞うとしよう」
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前の言葉の裏には真実がある…今の私には見えぬ真実がな。だが、彼女の運命は私の夢の中で必ず明かされるだろう。それまでは…神々に、彼女への慈悲を乞うとしよう」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “你的话语背后蕴含着真相，猴子。虽然我现在看不到，但我的梦境会向我揭示他们的命运。在那之前，我祈求诸神善待她。”
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."

traits.locale_text: “你的话语背后蕴含着真相，猴子。虽然我现在看不到，但我的梦境会向我揭示他们的命运。在那之前，我祈求诸神善待她。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Il y a une part de vérité dans vos paroles, mon-keigh. Une vérité que je ne peux pas voir maintenant. Mais son sort m'apparaîtra certainement en rêve. En attendant, j'implorerai les dieux de faire preuve de bienveillance à son égard. »
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a une part de vérité dans vos paroles, mon-keigh. Une vérité que je ne peux pas voir maintenant. Mais son sort m'apparaîtra certainement en rêve. En attendant, j'implorerai les dieux de faire preuve de bienveillance à son égard. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht Wahrheit, Chem-Pan-Sey – eine Wahrheit, die ich im Moment nicht sehen kann. Aber in meinen Träumen werde ich ganz sicher ihr Schicksal sehen. Bis dahin werde ich die Götter anflehen, dass sie ihr gegenüber gütig sind."
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht Wahrheit, Chem-Pan-Sey – eine Wahrheit, die ich im Moment nicht sehen kann. Aber in meinen Träumen werde ich ganz sicher ihr Schicksal sehen. Bis dahin werde ich die Götter anflehen, dass sie ihr gegenüber gütig sind."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Söylediklerinin ardında hakikat saklı mon-keigh. Şu anda göremediğim bir hakikat... Ancak düşlerimde muhakkak ki onun kaderini göreceğim. O vakte kadar tanrılardan cömertliklerini ondan esirgememelerini dileyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But I will most certainly see her fate in my dreams. Until then, I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward her."

traits.locale_text: "Söylediklerinin ardında hakikat saklı mon-keigh. Şu anda göremediğim bir hakikat... Ancak düşlerimde muhakkak ki onun kaderini göreceğim. O vakte kadar tanrılardan cömertliklerini ondan esirgememelerini dileyeceğim."
